# builds list

List builds for a workspace

Aliases:

* ls

## Usage

```console
coder builds list [flags] <workspace>
```

## Options

### -c, --column

|         |                                                                   |
|---------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Type    | <code>[build\|build id\|status\|reason\|created\|duration]</code> |
| Default | <code>build,build id,status,reason,created,duration</code>        |

Columns to display in table output.

### -o, --output

|         |                          |
|---------|--------------------------|
| Type    | <code>table\|json</code> |
| Default | <code>table</code>       |

Output format.
